title: Resolution
description: BOOK 2Life is finally good for Deanna after the horrific events that almost claimed her life a year ago. As she settles into a promising future with Nate, the Raven's MC President, danger lurks unknown around the corner.When the club is sabotaged and ghosts of the past return to haunt Deanna, she and Nate become unsure of who they can actually trust.As the pieces of the puzzle fall into place, Deanna finally discovers a deadly buried secret. Will the revelation destroy her or will Nate do whatever it takes to keep her safe?PLEASE NOTE - this is a romance novel based in an MC and NOT a one-percenter motorcycle clubContains scenes of sex and violenceEnglish/Scottish lingo
author: Suzanne  Clark
